restart_icloud3.description: Note: Changes to tracked devices require restarting iCloud3
restart_icloud3.title: Confirm Restarting iCloud3

data.username: APPPLE ID - The email address used to sign in to the iCloud Acount
data.password: PASSWORD - The Password of the iCloud Acount
data.data_source: LOCATION DATA SOURCE - The services used for location and other data (iCloud, iOS App, both)
data.icloud_server_endpoint_suffix: ICLOUD SERVER LOCATION -  Countries having localized Apple iCloud Servers (Not Normally Used)s

data.verification_code: ICLOUD ACCOUNT VERIFICATION CODE - The 6-digit verification code received from Apple

data.ic3_devicename: ICLOUD3 DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY ID - The HA device_tracker entity assigned to this device
data.fname: FRIENDLY NAME - Displayed in HA device_tracker and sensor names and on the Event Log
data.device_type: DEVICE TYPE - iPhone, iPad, Watch, etc.
data.tracking_mode: TRACKING MODE - How location requests should be done (Full tracking, Monitor, Inactive)
data.iosapp: iOS APP MONITORED - Is the iOS App is installed on this device and will it monitored

data.ic3_devicename: ICLOUD3 DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY ID - The HA device_tracker entity assigned to this device
data.fname: FRIENDLY NAME - Displayed in HA device_tracker and sensor names and on the Event Log
data.device_type: DEVICE TYPE - iPhone, iPad, Watch, etc.
data.tracking_mode: TRACKING MODE - How location requests should be done (Full tracking, Monitor, Inactive)
data.famshr_devicename: FAMILY SHARING LIST DEVICE - Use location data from this iCloud Acct Family Sharing member
data.fmf_email: FIND-MY-FRIENDS DEVICE - Use location data from this FindMy device sharing their info with you
data.iosapp_device: IOS APP DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY - Use this HA device location data & zone enter/exit triggers
data.track_from_zones: TRACK-FROM-ZONES - Track travel time & distance from Home and other zones
data.track_from_base_zone: PRIMARY HOME ZONE - Use another zone if you are away from Home for an extended period
data.picture: PICTURE - Photo image of the person normally using this device (40x40 pixels is best size)
data.inzone_interval: INZONE INTERVAL - Time between location requests when in a zone

data_description.track_from_base_zone: Normally, the Home zone is used as the base location for all tracking (travel time, distance, etc).  However, a different zone can be used as the base location if you are away from Home for an extended period or the device is normally at another location (vacation house, second home, parent's house, etc.)

data.opt_action: This device will no longer be tracked by iCloud3. It's device_tracker and sensor entities will be removed. Are you sure you want to do this?
This will erase all iCloud3 tracked devices. The device_tracker and sensor entities will be removed. Are you sure you want to do this?

data.display_zone_format: ZONE NAME FORMAT - Format used to display the Zone name in sensors and the Event Log
data.time_format: TIME FORMAT - Time format for sensors and the Event Log
data.unit_of_measurement: UNIT OF MEASUREMENT - Distance format for sensors and the Event Log
data.event_log_card_directory: EVENT LOG CARD LOVELACE RESOURCES DIRECTORY - Event Log custom card .js file directory

data.text_from: ORIGINAL TEXT - Text to be replaced (example: gary_real_email@gmail.com)
data.text_to: DISPLAYED TEXT- Text to be displayed (display:  gary@email.com)

display_text_as_update.title: Update Event Log 'Display Text As' Value

menu_options.action_pause: ◈ PAUSE > Pause polling on all devices
menu_options.action_resume: ◈ RESUME > Resume Polling on all devices, Refresh all locations
menu_options.action_reauth: ◈ ENTER APPLE ID VERIFICATION CODE > Enter the Apple 6-digit Verification Code
menu_options.action_reset_icloud: ◈ RESET AND REAUTHENTICATE ACCOUNT > Request New Auth Code
menu_options.action_evlog_export: ◈ EXPORT EVENT LOG > Export Event Log data
menu_options.action_waze_db_recalc: ◈ WAZE HIST DATABASE > Recalc time/distance data at midnight
menu_options.action_waze_db_track: ◈ WAZE HIST MAP TRACK > Load route locations for map display
menu_options.action_erase_all_devices: ◈ ERASE ALL DEVICES > Reinitialize the iCloud3 Device List
menu_options.action_exit: ◈ MAIN MENU > Return to the Main Menu

data.log_level: LOG LEVEL - The type of messages that are added to the HA log file during iCloud3 operations
data.gps_accuracy_threshold: GPS ACCURACY THRESHOLD - Locations with GPS Accuracy above this value will be discarded
data.old_location_threshold: OLD LOCATION THRESHOLD - Locations older than this value will be discarded
data.max_interval: MAXIMUM INTERVAL - The maximum time between location requests
data.tfz_tracking_max_distance: TRACK-FROM-ZONE DISPLAY DISTANCE - TfZ Time & dist is displayed  when close to the TfZ zone
data.offline_interval: DEVICE OFFLINE INTERVAL - Location request interval when offline (Airplane mode, dead cell area, etc)
data.travel_time_factor: TRAVEL TIME INTERVAL MULTIPLIER - Next location time = Waze travel time to zone * this value

data.iphone: IPHONE - iPhone & iPod default inzone interval
data.watch: APPLE WATCH - Apple Watch default inzone interval
data.no_iosapp: IOS APP IS NOT INSTALLED - Default interval if the iOS App is not used for location monitoring and zone enter/exit triggers
data.other: OTHER DEVICE TYPE - Unspecified device type inzone interval
data.discard_poor_gps_inzone: Discard Location Updates with Poor GPS Accuracy when in a Zone
data.center_in_zone: Change Device's Location to the Zone's Center when in a Zone

inzone_intervals.description: Defines the default values for the location request interval assigned to a device when it is added to iCloud3. It can be changed for each device on the Update Device form
inzone_intervals.title: inZone Parameters and Default Intervals

data.waze_used: USE WAZE ROUTE SERVICE - Request zone distance and travel time from Waze Route Service
data.waze_region: ROUTE SERVER LOCATION - Location of the Waze Route Server for your area
data.waze_realtime: USE REAL TIME DATA - Waze should consider traffic delays when determining travel time
data.waze_min_distance: WAZE MINIMUM DISTANCE - Use Waze Route Service when the zone distance is greater than this value
data.waze_max_distance: WAZE MAXIMUM DISTANCE - Use Waze Route Service when the zone distance is less than than this value

waze_main.description: The Waze Reoute Servers can provide travel time/distance data to determine the next location request time. If Waze is not available in your area, a straight-line/calculation method can be used instead.
waze_main.title: Waze - Route Service Travel Time/Distance

data.waze_history_database_used: WAZE HISTORY - Save Waze Route Info to the Waze History Database
data.waze_history_track_direction: GENERAL TRAVEL DIRECTION - Used to display 'Map Trace Lines' between saved locations
data.waze_history_max_distance: MAX DISTANCE - Do not save the Waze travel time & distance if the distance is greater than this value

waze_history_db.description: The Waze History Data base stores 'close to zone' travel time/distance information for a GPS location (100m radius). It reduces the number of internet requests to the Waze Servers after it has been in use for a while.
waze_history_db.title: Waze - History Database

data.passthru_zone_time: ENTER ZONE DELAY TIME - Delay processing a Zone Enter Trigger in case you are passing thru a zone
data.track_from_base_zone: PRIMARY 'HOME' ZONE - Use another zone if you are away from Home for an extended period (Global Override)
data.track_from_home_zone: ALSO TRACK FROM HOME ZONE - Continue to track from the Home zone when the Primary Home Zone is not Home
data.stat_zone_fname: FRIENDLY NAME - Name to display when in a Stat Zone.
data.stat_zone_still_time: NO MOVEMENT TIME - Time at the same location before moving into a Stationary Zone
data.stat_zone_inzone_interval: INZONE INTERVAL - Time interval between location requests when in a Stationary Zone
data.stat_zone_base_latitude: BASE LOCATION NORTH-SOUTH OFFSET - Dist (±km) north-south of the Home Zone (or it's GPS Latitude)
data.stat_zone_base_longitude: BASE LOCATION EAST/WEST OFFSET - Dist (±km) east-west of the Home Zone (or it's GPS Longitude)

data_description.stat_zone_fname: Use the wildcard '[name]' to also display part of the device name ('[name]StatZone' --> 'GarStatZone')
data_description.track_from_base_zone: Normally, the Home zone is used as the base location for all tracking (travel time, distance, etc).  However, a different zone can be used as the base location if you are away from Home for an extended period or the device is normally at another location (vacation house, second home, parent's house, etc.). This is a global setting that overrides the Base Zone assigned to an individual Device.
data_description.passthru_zone_header: You may be driving through a non-tracked zone but not stopping at tne zone. The iOS App issues a Enter Zone trigger when the device enters the zone and changes the device_tracker entity state to the Zone. iCloud3 does not process the Enter Zone trigger until the delay time has passed. This prevents processing a Zone Enter trigger that is immediately followed by a Zone Exit trigger and from cycling the iCloud3 device_tracker and zone sensors from Away (not_home) to the Zone and then back to Away
data_description.stat_zone_header: A Stationary Zone is created if the device remains in the same location (store, friends house, doctors office, etc.) for an extended period of time.
data_description.base_offset_header: The Stationary Zone is moved to it's 'Base Location' when it is not used by the device. This prevents the iOS App from moving the device into the Stationary Zone when it shouldn`t and helps prevent it from overlapping other zones

special_zones.title: Special Zones - Pass Through, Track From, Stationary

data.monitored_devices: MONITORED DEVICE SENSORS - Select the type of sensors to create for a Monitored Device
data.device: DEVICE SENSORS - Device status and information
data.tracking_update: LOCATION UPDATE SENSORS - Device location update times
data.track_from_zones: TRACK FROM MULTIPLE ZONE SENSORS - Used when tracking from more than one zone (not needed for tracking only from the Home zone)
data.tracking_other: OTHER TRACKING SENSORS - Not normally used but available
data.zone: ZONE SENSORS - Device zone status and information
data.other: OTHER SENSORS - Sensors not in the above areas

sensors.title: Device and Tracking Sensors created by iCloud3
